turns.content:
Elara nods and moves ahead of the group to check for traps. She uses her survival and nature skills to carefully inspect the door and surrounding area. After a few moments, she turns back to the group and gives a thumbs up, indicating that the way is clear.

As you and your party members enter the mansion, you find yourselves in a large foyer. The floor is covered in dust and debris, and the furniture is covered in cobwebs. The air is musty and stale. You see some stairs leading to the second floor, a door to the left that leads to the kitchen and another door on the right that leads to a drawing room.

You also hear some noises coming from upstairs, it sounds like someone is moving around.

What would you like to do next?
Ok, we enter and go upstairs to investigate the noise.

As you and your party members make your way up the stairs, you are cautious and ready for anything. You reach the second floor, and you find a long hallway with several doors leading to different rooms. The noise is coming from one of the rooms at the end of the hall.

You peek inside the room, and you see a figure dressed in black, wearing a mask, and holding a bag of loot. They are busy stuffing items into the bag and seem to be unaware of your presence.

What would you like to do now?
I use stealth to try and get within grabbing distance of the figure without them noticing me.

You try to use your stealth to sneak up on the figure. As a rogue, you have a dexterity score of 16 and proficiency in stealth, giving you a total stealth bonus of +5. You move quietly down the hallway, trying to stay out of sight and close to the wall.

As you get closer to the figure, you can see that they are dressed in black clothes, with a black mask covering their face. They seem to be focused on looting the room and don't notice you.

You are now within grabbing distance of the figure, what would you like to do next?
I grab the figure and remove their mask.

You quickly move in and grab the figure, catching them off guard. You yank off their mask, revealing the face of Maric, the follower of Selune who you met at the temple. He has a shocked and startled expression on his face, his eyes wide with surprise and fear.

It looks like Maric is the thief, but you are not sure of his motives yet. You could question him or tie him up and call the guards or you could let him go and follow him to see where he is going.

What would you like to do now?
I ask Maric what he's doing here.

Maric looks at you with a mixture of fear and guilt in his eyes. He stammers for a moment before speaking. "I-I'm sorry," he says. "I didn't mean to steal from these people. I've been having these dreams, and in them, Selune tells me to take these things. I know it sounds crazy, but I swear it's true. I've been leaving the symbols as a sign of my devotion to her."

He looks at you pleadingly, "Please, you have to believe me. I'll return everything I've taken. I just need to find a way to make things right with Selune."

You are now faced with a moral dilemma, Maric is confessing to the thefts but he claims that he is acting under the influence of a deity. You could take him to the guard and let them deal with him or you could try to help him find a way to make amends and clear his name.

What would you like to do now?
I try to help him. I ask him where he was taking the stolen loot.

Maric looks relieved that you are willing to help him. He tells you that he has been taking the stolen items to an abandoned temple of Selune, located in a forest outside of the city. He says that he has been leaving the items there as offerings to Selune, in the hopes that she will forgive him for his actions.

You and your party members decide to accompany Maric to the abandoned temple, in hopes of finding a way to clear his name and make amends for his actions.

As you make your way to the temple, you find that it's a small, rundown building, nestled in a clearing in the forest. It's clear that it has been abandoned for many years.

You notice that the door is slightly ajar, and you can hear a faint chanting coming from inside.

What would you like to do now?
I ask Maric what happens in the temple.

Maric looks uneasy as he approaches the temple. "I-I'm not sure," he says. "I've only been here a few times. I usually leave the offerings and then leave. I've never been inside."

With that information, you and your party members decide to proceed with caution and enter the temple to investigate. Inside, you find a small, dimly lit room. In the center of the room, there's an altar and a few candles burning. On the altar, you see a pile of items that match the descriptions of the items that have been reported stolen.

As you look around the room, you see a figure in the shadows, dressed in dark robes with a crescent moon symbol on the chest. The figure is chanting in a language that you don't understand.

You realize that this figure might be the one who is behind the thefts, and the one who has been manipulating Maric.

What would you like to do now?
Does the figure see us?

As the figure is chanting, it seems to be unaware of your presence, the candles provide just enough light to see the room but not enough to see who is standing at the door. You and your party members have the element of surprise in your favor, but you should act fast before the figure notices you.
I have Elara ready her bow to fire at the figure while I try to stealth close enough to grab them.

You signal for Elara to get ready with her bow, while you try to use your stealth to get closer to the figure. Elara nocks an arrow and takes aim, ready to fire at a moment's notice.

As you move closer to the figure, it becomes clear that it's a human female. She is heavily involved in her chanting and still hasn't noticed you. You are now close enough to grab her.

What would you like to do now?
I jump on her back and try to restrain her.

You quickly move in, jumping on the figure's back and trying to restrain her. She lets out a surprised cry as you tackle her to the ground, but she struggles fiercely, trying to break free.

Your party members quickly come to help you and together you are able to subdue her. She is now restrained and you can question her.

As you remove her hood, you see that she has a crescent moon tattoo on her forehead, similar to the symbol that has been appearing at the scene of the crimes.

What would you like to do now?
Lets get back to the campaign. I ask the figure we've just apprehended about the crescent moon tattoo on her forehead.

The figure, now that is subdued, looks at you with a mix of anger and defiance. She tells you that the crescent moon tattoo is the symbol of her cult, a secret society that worship Selune, the goddess of the moon. She tells you that the cult is dedicated to serving Selune and carrying out her will.

She tells you that the cult has been around for centuries, and that it has always been a peaceful and benevolent organization, dedicated to helping the poor and the needy. She tells you that she doesn't know anything about the burglaries, but she is sure that the cult is not involved.

You are not sure if you can trust her words but you could question her more, or let her go and follow her.

What would you like to do now?
I think thats enough for me for tonight. Lets save this place and come back to the campaign later.

Of course, we can pick up the campaign later whenever you're ready. I'll make sure to save our progress so we can pick up where we left off. If you have any questions or need any help in the meantime, feel free to reach out. Have a good night!
